feature.label: Legacy Support for POOSL IDE
feature.description: This Plug-in adds the following features to the POOSL IDE. * Import SHESim v3.0 XML files and convert them to POOSL files. * Export POOSL model to SHESim v3.0 XML with defaults for graphical layout.
